queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'jenkins-jenkins' of kind 'BuildTemplate' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/docker.sock' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'jenkins-jenkins' of kind 'BuildTemplate' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run/docker.sock' with hostPath

queries.query_name: Docker Daemon Socket is Exposed to Containers
queries.description: Sees if Docker Daemon Socket is not exposed to Containers

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{jenkins-test}}.spec.volumes.name={{docker-sock-volume}}.hostPath.path should not be '/var/run/docker.sock'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{jenkins-test}}.spec.volumes.name={{docker-sock-volume}}.hostPath.path is '/var/run/docker.sock'
